title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the country in 1985 that has the lowest percentage of a population living in urban areas.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the trend in the United Kingdomâ€™s percentage of a population living in urban areas.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe how urbanization influences demographic change.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about what may have been a principal cause of the growing gap in urbanization between China and Nigeria between 2000-2018.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain how governments have responded to the overall trend in urbanization illustrated in the data.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
